sources.name: Colonial Regimes (Minner and Wim 2006)
sources.description:
Data published by Wimmer and Min (2006) – “From empire to nation-state: Explaining war in the modern world, 1816-2001”, American Sociological Review 71(6):867-897, 2006.
Data publisher's source  
Linkhttp://www.columbia.edu/~aw2951/Datasets.html
Retrieved3/08/2016

The data was extended to 2015 by Our World In Data. The original data set ends in 2001.
